Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database and performing various operations such as user registration, login validation, invitation code handling, Qinvalid input: '&A' management, reviews, messaging, and trusted reviewers functionality.

      public boolean isDatabaseEmpty() throws SQLException
      Checks whether the user table is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the cse360users table is empty, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getRoleFromInvitationCode

      public String getRoleFromInvitationCode(String code)
      Retrieves the role associated with a given invitation code.
      Parameters:
      code - the invitation code
      Returns:
      the role associated with the code, or null if not found

    • validateInvitationCode

      public boolean validateInvitationCode(String code)
      Validates an invitation code.

      The code is valid if it exists, is not marked as used, and its deadline has not passed. If valid, the code is marked as used.

      Parameters:
      code - the invitation code to validate
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid; false otherwise

    • generateOTP

      public String generateOTP(String userName)
      Generates a 6-digit OTP for a user.

      Before generating a new OTP, unused OTPs for the user are cleared.

      Parameters:
      userName - the username for which the OTP is generated
      Returns:
      the generated OTP

    • validateOTP

      public boolean validateOTP(String userName, String otp)
      Validates a given OTP for a user.

      If the OTP is found and not used, it is marked as used.

      Parameters:
      userName - the username for which the OTP is validated
      otp - the OTP to validate
      Returns:
      true if the OTP is valid; false otherwise

    • clearOTP

      public void clearOTP(String userName)
      Clears all OTP records for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username for which OTPs are cleared

    • updatePassword

      public void updatePassword(String userName, String newPassword)
      Updates the password for a given user.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username whose password is to be updated
      newPassword - the new password

    • hasOTP

      public boolean hasOTP(String userName)
      Checks if the user has any OTP records.
      Parameters:
      userName - the username to check for OTPs
      Returns:
      true if at least one OTP record exists; false otherwise

    • getAllUsernamesAndRoles

      public List<String[]> getAllUsernamesAndRoles()
      Retrieves all usernames and roles from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of string arrays where each array contains a username and its role

    • getReviewsByReviewer

      public List<Review> getReviewsByReviewer(String reviewerId) throws SQLException

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      a list of Review objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewsAboutStudent

      public List<Review> getReviewsAboutStudent(String studentUsername) throws SQLException
      Retrieves reviews related to a student.

      For questions, it retrieves reviews for questions created by the student. For answers, it retrieves all reviews related to answers provided by the student.

      Parameters:
      studentUsername - the student's username
      Returns:
      a list of Review objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateReviewWeightage

      public void updateReviewWeightage(int reviewId, int weightage) throws SQLException
      Updates the weightage of a review.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review
      weightage - the new weightage value
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • insertMessage

      public void insertMessage(Message message) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new message into the database.
      Parameters:
      message - the Message object containing message details
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getMessagesForReview

      public List<Message> getMessagesForReview(int reviewId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all messages for a given review, ordered by the time sent.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the ID of the review
      Returns:
      a list of Message objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getReviewerIdForReview

      public String getReviewerIdForReview(int reviewId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the reviewer ID associated with a review.
      Parameters:
      reviewId - the review ID
      Returns:
      the reviewer's username, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getStudentIdForReview

      public String getStudentIdForReview(int reviewId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the student ID (username) associated with a review.

      For reviews of questions, it returns the creator of the question. For reviews of answers, it returns the answerer.

      Parameters:
      reviewId - the review ID
      Returns:
      the student's username, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • sendReviewerRequest

      public void sendReviewerRequest(String senderUsername)
      Inserts a reviewer request into the database.
      Parameters:
      senderUsername - the username of the student requesting to become a reviewer

    • getReviewerRequests

      public List<String> getReviewerRequests()
      Retrieves all reviewer requests from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of usernames who have requested to become reviewers

    • promoteToReviewer

      public void promoteToReviewer(String username)
      Promotes a student to a reviewer by updating their role in the database. Also removes the corresponding reviewer request.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the student to be promoted

    • removeReviewerRequest

      public void removeReviewerRequest(String username)
      Removes a reviewer request from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username whose reviewer request is to be removed

    • addTrustedReviewer

      public void addTrustedReviewer(String student, String reviewer) throws SQLException
      Inserts a trusted reviewer pair into the TrustedReviewers table.
      Parameters:
      student - the student's username
      reviewer - the reviewer's username
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • removeTrustedReviewer

      public void removeTrustedReviewer(String student, String reviewer) throws SQLException
      Removes a trusted reviewer pair from the TrustedReviewers table.
      Parameters:
      student - the student's username
      reviewer - the reviewer's username to remove
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getTrustedReviewers

      public List<String> getTrustedReviewers(String student) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of reviewer usernames that a student has marked as trusted.
      Parameters:
      student - the student's username
      Returns:
      a list of trusted reviewer usernames
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • searchReviewsByTrustedReviewers

      public List<Review> searchReviewsByTrustedReviewers(String student, String keyword) throws SQLException
      Searches for reviews from trusted reviewers based on a keyword.

      Only reviews from reviewers that the student has marked as trusted are considered. The search is case-insensitive and the results are ordered by weightage (descending) and creation time.

      Parameters:
      student - the student's username requesting the search
      keyword - the keyword to search for in the review content
      Returns:
      a list of Review objects matching the search criteria
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection and associated statement.

    • getAllQuestionsAndAnswers

      public List<String> getAllQuestionsAndAnswers()
      Retrieves all questions and associated answers.
      Returns:
      List of formatted Qinvalid input: '&A' strings.

    • getAllPrivateFeedback

      public List<String> getAllPrivateFeedback()
      Retrieves all private feedback messages from the database.
      Returns:
      List of feedback message strings.

    • addInstructorNote

      public void addInstructorNote(String note)
      Inserts a new instructor note into the database.
      Parameters:
      note - The note to add.

    • searchContentByKeyword

      public List<String> searchContentByKeyword(String keyword)
      Searches for a keyword in questions and answers.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The search keyword.
      Returns:
      List of matched results.
